title: Resume
text:
Phone: (208) 569-1914
Email: nickolas.kirby14@gmail.com
LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/nickolas-k-a0a962210



Upcoming Accounting graduate aspiring to become a CPA, eager to apply my strong foundation in accounting principles, data science, and analytical skills to contribute effectively in an entry-level role.




Bachelor of Science in Accounting
Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg, Idaho
Sep 2020 - Dec 2024

Major in Accounting
Certificate of Data Science
Relevant coursework: Financial Accounting, Cost Accounting, Tax Accounting, Accounting Information Systems, Advanced Spreadsheet Application, Data Science Programming, Business Analytics







Rexburg Floral, Rexburg, Idaho
Sep 2022 - Present

Managed cargo handling, ensured order fulfillment, and resolved issues related to the distribution of deliveries.
Developed comprehensive order sheets and refined route directions to enhance efficiency and timeliness of deliveries.




Melaleuca: The Wellness Company, Idaho Falls, Idaho
Sep 2023 - Jan 2024

Prepared financial statements and assisted with internal auditing for the company’s foreign division, while also conducting special projects involving research, coordination, and information gathering.
Reviewed and analyzed departmental variances monthly to identify material differences, and prepared closing journal entries to address any discrepancies or errors.




Yellowstone Plastics, Idaho Falls, Idaho
Jul 2023 - Sep 2023

Promoted from “Business Operations Intern” at a sister company into a specialized “Accounting Intern” by exceeding expectations and displaying exceptional knowledge regarding accounting systems and scenarios.
Led and analyzed with the accounting manager regarding: Chart of accounts, Financial Statements, Cash Flow Projection, Petty Cash Reconciliation, Account Reconciliations, Month-End Entries, Accounts Payable, Cycle Counting/Inventory Management.




Volm Companies, Idaho Falls, Idaho
Jun 2023 - Sep 2023

Received hands-on experience working in a variety of departments including Purchasing, Production, Finance, Sales, Inventory Control, Human Resources, Safety, IT, Transportation, Logistics, Marketing, and Equipment.
Acquired comprehensive understanding of end-to-end business operations, encompassing workflow, processes, and product delivery throughout various departments.




Pick Me Up Drinks, Idaho Falls, Rigby, Rexburg, Idaho
Sep 2020 - Sep 2022

Remained at the top of sales while managing inventory, cashiering, credit card processing, and money handling along with miscellaneous tasks.
Executed opening and closing procedures, monitored employee workflow, and fostered team collaboration to ensure smooth operations at the location.







Software & Tools: Infor CloudSuite ERP Cloud System, J.D. Edwards, Data Access Studio, SAGE, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Power BI, Tableau
Other Skills: Supervising, Problem Solving, Business Development, Communication, Teamwork, Inventory, Time Management
